headline: Online Tip
subtitle: Make Yourself Heard
content:
Pop on a headset to get the most out of GTA Online and make new criminal friends to help you on your spree through Los Santos.

The speaker icon next to a player’s name indicates someone who has a headset connected, but don’t worry - If you are stuck in a session with a heavy breather, or other undesirable, you can shut them up by viewing their player card in the Online > Players menu and selecting ‘Mute’.
